details: Engaged in a skill-focused master's degree program emphasizing hands-on learning and in-demand skills development.
Acquired expertise in advanced algorithms, data structures, and software architecture.

Gained comprehensive knowledge of embedded programming and its application in software development.

education.degree: Diploma of Full Stack Web Development
details: Completed an intensive bootcamp covering both front-end and back-end web development.
Acquired proficiency in building dynamic web applications using technologies such as Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Gained experience in version control using Git and collaboration platforms like GitHub.
Participated in real-world projects and coding challenges to enhance problem-solving skills.
Hands-on experience in implementing security protocols to safeguard digital assets.
Conducted threat analysis and risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities and mitigate potential security risks.
Learned about the latest cybersecurity trends and best practices to protect against emerging threats.
Acquired knowledge and experience in user-centered design principles and methodologies.
Conducted user research to understand user needs and behaviors.
Developed wireframes, prototypes, and conducted usability testing to iterate and improve designs.
Learned the fundamentals of web development, including HTML5 and CSS3.
Acquired skills in creating responsive, visually appealing web pages.
Explored modern CSS techniques and best practices for styling and layout.

education.degree: Certificate in Intro to Front End with Javascript
details: Developed expertise in front-end web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Learned about asynchronous HTTP requests using AJAX for real-time data processing and retrieval.
